title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to run Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma and other open-source models locally on macOS, Linux & Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in two lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; fetch-like interface to Ollama endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM, chat or embeddings provider in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); docker run one command to get a full chat interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven package offering sync/async APIs and POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history and repl mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to your local Ollama instance for private coding assistance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-ready NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: FastAPI + Ollama + ChromaDB to chat with your PDFs locally.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama answers in chat; supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows; supports chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistent model storage.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama; NuGet package with async streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama; includes chat, completions and embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template wired to Ollama; drag-and-drop PDFs for instant local RAG experiments.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by your local Ollama instance for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Reference repo showing how to fine-tune Mistral-7B with LoRA and serve it via Ollama for domain-specific RAG.

title: ollama-on-termux
summary: Guide and scripts to compile and run Ollama on Android phones via Termux (CPU-only, small models).
